price: Her canlı, ölümü tadar. Bir deneme olarak sizi hayırla da, şerle de imtihan ederiz. Ve siz, ancak bize döndürüleceksiniz.
arabic: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۗ وَنَبۡلُوكُم بِٱلشَّرِّ وَٱلۡخَيۡرِ فِتۡنَةٗۖ وَإِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kullu nafsin dhāiqatu al-mawti wanablūkum bil-shari wal-khayri fit'natan wa-ilaynā tur'jaʿūna
